\n\tSolSource Classic.productDescription:
SolSource Classic is the ultimate solar cooker.

100% solar powered
Reached 550F/350C
Boils 1 quart of water in 10 minutes
Works with indoor cookware
Purify water for drinking
\n\tSolSource Classic.pageTitle: SolSource Solar Cooker -The Ultimate Solar Cooker

\n\tSolSource Classic Cover.productDescription:
Features

Perfect fit for SolSource Classic
Prevent unwanted glare when cooker is not in use.
Protect your SolSource solar cooker from UV, water, dirt, and wind.
Double stitched seams for durability.
\n\tSolSource Classic Cover.pageTitle: SolSource Classic Cover - SolSource by One Earth Designs

\n\tSolSource Classic Grill Pan.productDescription:
Get perfect grill lines with the SolSource Classic Grill Pan whether on SolSource or your indoor stove. Excellent heat-spread, retention, and cleaning. Black-anodized for maximum solar absorption.

Fast, even heat spread
Non-stick and easy to clean
Ridges that give perfect grill lines
Optimized for solar cooking
\n\tSolSource Classic Grill Pan.pageTitle: SolSource Grill Pan - One Earth Designs Shop

Start your solar cooking experience today with the SolSource Bundle.

\n\tSolSource Sport Cover.productDescription: The cover fits SolSource Sport perfectly. It turns your SolSource Sport off when not in use by making sure all the sun’s rays are fully blocked. It also increases the durability of your SolSource Sport by protecting it from the elements when setting up for multiple days at your campsite or in your backyard.
